subtitle: June 13th, 2017 - Meeting - San Ramon Valley Unified School District Board of Education.
description:
June 13th, 2017 - Meeting - San Ramon Valley Unified School District Board of Education.
00:02:39 - 9.1 - Presentation - National Geographic Bee Finalist

01:47:41 - 12.1 - Board Member's Reports
